original_definition: 'Automatic power down' means a function which switches the active mode of an SSTB into standby mode after a period in the active mode following the last user interaction and/or channel change.
generated_definition: 'Automatic power down' means the automatic shutdown of a system, device, or process without human intervention, typically triggered by a timer or sensor detection of a predetermined condition.

Article 2: ‘Automatic power down’ means a function which switches the active mode of an SSTB into standby mode after a period in the active mode following the last user interaction and/or channel change.
